attributes.action: Bring back the Death Penalty for gun related murderers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its time to bring back the death penalty for gun murders in light of the death of Rhys Jones. Young murderers know they will be out in half their sentence. Gang culture can not be tolerated anymore. If they,re old enough to kill they,re old enough to die.PLEASE support this before more families have to suffer. It could be yours next.Thank You.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
